entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.4°C

Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 43 %

Dewpoint: -28.9°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
